entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.3.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • remove previous function by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/326
  • fix gradio css by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/327
  • ... by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/328
  • Added fine-tuned model test by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/329
  • Added Individual tts engine workflows back in again by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/333
  • just made it one file again idk by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/334
  • Update --help command output in readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/330
  • various update by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/337
  • final switch from miniconda to miniforge by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/338
  • ... by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/339
  • fix zsh by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/343
  • fix cmd and sh by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/344
  • fix max_tts_in_memory by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/345
  • various fixes by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/354
  • switched to absolute path for TMPDIR by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/356
  • cleanup TMPDIR code by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/357
  • fix windows cmd script by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/358
  • second fix #32 and #350 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/359
  • final fix #32 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/360
  • final fix #37 + optimize resume process by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/362
  • Attempt at fixing issue #364 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/365
  • fix #366 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/367

entry.content:

entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.3.21
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.4.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed Kaggle Notebook by @Rihcus in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/598
  • Fixing torch version variant issues by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/601
  • reverting back to bark as default test.... by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/602
  • test bark #27 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/603
  • added Jamie voice by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/604
  • test bark #28 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/605
